## Provider.getUnspentOutputsWithAsset() method

Retrieves the unspent outputs for a given address and asset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract getUnspentOutputsWithAsset(address: Address, unit: AssetId): Promise<TransactionUnspentOutput[]>;
```
